mapper.select: select a.plan_id, a.user_id, a.title, a.content, a.destination, a.personnel, a.views, a.likes, TO_CHAR(a.start_day, 'YY-MM-DD') as start_day, TO_CHAR(a.end_day, 'YY-MM-DD') as end_day, TO_CHAR(a.reg_date, 'YY-MM-DD') as reg_date, TO_CHAR(a.finish_date, 'YY-MM-DD') as finish_date, a.plan_state, REGEXP_SUBSTR(a.content, '<img[^>]+>', 1, 1) as first_image, b.nick, b.birth, b.gender, b.file_name from JOIN_BOARD a, (select nick, TRUNC((SYSDATE - BIRTH) / 365) as birth, DECODE(gender, 'M', '남자', 'F', '여자') as gender, file_name, user_id from users where status = 0) b where plan_state != 2 and a.user_id = b.user_id and a.plan_id = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOIN_BOARD_MEMBER (plan_id, user_id) VALUES (planId, userId)
mapper.select: SELECT p.plan_id, p.user_id FROM JOIN_BOARD_MEMBER p WHERE p.plan_id = #{planId} GROUP BY p.plan_id, p.user_id ORDER BY plan_id, user_id

select a.PLAN_ID, a.USER_ID, a.TITLE, a.CONTENT, a.DESTINATION, a.PERSONNEL, TO_CHAR(a.start_day, 'YY-MM-DD') as START_DAY, TO_CHAR(a.end_day, 'YY-MM-DD') as END_DAY, TO_CHAR(a.reg_date, 'YY-MM-DD') as REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(a.finish_date, 'YY-MM-DD') as FINISH_DATE, a.PLAN_STATE, REGEXP_SUBSTR(a.CONTENT, '<img[^>]+>', 1, 1) as first_image, b.nick, b.birth, b.gender from JOIN_BOARD a, (select nick, TRUNC((SYSDATE - BIRTH) / 365) as birth, DECODE(gender, 'M', '남자', 'F', '여자') as gender, user_id from users where user_id = #{userId}) b where a.user_id = #{userId}
